## First Line Server Log
```
2020-01-10 09:30:59,504 INFO main:com.cloudera.server.cmf.Main: ================================================================================
```
## Log Contain Started Jetty Server
```
2020-01-10 09:32:10,247 INFO WebServerImpl:org.mortbay.log: Started SelectChannelConnector@0.0.0.0:7180
2020-01-10 09:32:10,247 INFO WebServerImpl:com.cloudera.server.cmf.WebServerImpl: Started Jetty server.
```
## DB.Properties
```
[centos@ip-172-31-16-171 cloudera-scm-server]$ sudo cat db.properties
# Auto-generated by scm_prepare_database.sh on Fri Jan 10 09:21:06 UTC 2020
#
# For information describing how to configure the Cloudera Manager Server
# to connect to databases, see the "Cloudera Manager Installation Guide."
#
com.cloudera.cmf.db.type=mysql
com.cloudera.cmf.db.host=172.31.25.172
com.cloudera.cmf.db.name=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.user=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.setupType=EXTERNAL
com.cloudera.cmf.db.password=welcome1
```
